author: holiman
content: Getting _all_ the leaves for one trie-root in one large dump -- that was the essence of parity's warp-sync. It was impossible to verify until the whole thing was downloaded, and also the server-part had to pause the world to generate the dump, and it took longer than the dump-lifetime to actually generate it. So _ideally_ we would not pivot, but practically the pivoting + healing is what makes the protocol work
